The energy balls didn't do much damage, and didn't distract his attention. =
He wanted to face Termitron full on when he ran up suddenly. Stranato broug=
ht up the tiny gun, as tiny as it was, and was blocking the shots. It appea=
red that he was the best fighter of the Radicons.

Stranato: Good show!

ranato said when Termitron cut into his arm...
